title: Guys, this tweet from Chris Hayes on Joe Biden/Ukraine has to be one of the funniest ones we’ve ever read
text:
Shortly after the New York Times’ Ken Vogel appeared on MSNBC and declared that the Ukraine story is a “serious liability” for Joe Biden, Chris Hayes tweeted this:

I am watching this somehow turn into a story about Biden and am going to pass out. — Chris Hayes (@chrislhayes) September 20, 2019

ROFLMAO:

There is not enough popcorn in the universe if this Ukraine story ends up kicking Biden out of the race:

Stop attacking the New York Times, dude:

Not enough news orgs are making the point that the person in question in 2015 was somehow us and eu believed was corrupt and had to go. Biden was US point man. Whole thing is preposterous. Everybody knows this. Some msm effort to muddy it. https://t.co/KpGN2b3fVN — Josh Marshall (@joshtpm) September 20, 2019

But democracy or something is at stake if you attack the press:

Let’s see if the press do their job or yet again repeat 2016 https://t.co/FxqHWHuJqF — Alex Kruglov (@akruglov) September 20, 2019

Grab a chair and sit a spell, because what’s about to happen will be glorious:

***
